title: Reboot
description: '5 years ago, I died. 178 minutes later, I woke up.'In this post-apocalyptic thriller a deadly virus mutation sees teenagers raised from the dead and trained to be vicious soldiers until Wren, the deadliest Reboot, joins forces with Callum, the most innocent, to try to overthrow the organisation that has corrupted their world.
author: Amy Tintera
